data.name: VR NSFW
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the sexiest, naughtiest gaming experience in a high quality VR erotic game.
The way the beautiful girls pant and moan is as real as it gets, and there are all kinds of erotic features.
The 3D sounds, physics, fluid simulation, soft textures, and mechanical controls have been meticulously refined.
Descriptions, videos, and screenshots can't tell the whole story, so please experience it for yourself!

Character depicted in this game are 18 years of age or older.

Controls:
Use the controller to move, select menus, and operate machines.
You can move in all four directions, or use teleportation.

Description of features:
[Change Body]
・Breast size, horn size
・Naked, sexy bikini, micro bikini
・Tanning (fair skin, tanned skin)
・After-tan (none, bikini, sportswear, swimming suit)
・Change bikini pattern (bright red, cow pattern, clock pattern, camouflage pattern)

[Controls]
・A vibrator can be inserted into the vagina and mouth.
・Press the button to retrieve the vibrator.
・Left joystick: height
・Right joystick: angle
・Use pedal to adjust leg opening

・Male genitals (on/off)
・Squeeze hand to change position
・Press (the joystick or trigger) to ejaculate

Sexual highlights:
・Vivid expression of the body's natural and fleshy texture
・Play with the strings coming from the mouth and vagina
・Feel the warmth of the erotic animated breathing
・Realistic sound effects made by objects and places
・Body shape, bikini type and pattern can be customized in detail
・Move the male genitals as you please, linked to your body movements, and ejaculate as much as you want
・Set up a mirror for even deeper immersion into the VR gaming experience


The character model of this work uses the original 3D avatar ""KURONATU"" sold by thw.
Sales site link: https://nanka-tsukurouyo.booth.pm/items/3329958
Twitter link of author thw (@thw_VRC): https://twitter.com/thw_VRC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
